FuncDef:
The blacklist disable command disables the blacklist function.
The undo blacklist disable command restores the default configuration.
By default, the blacklist function is enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You can configure a blacklist to filter out packets that do not need to be sent to the CPU. By default, no blacklist is configured. The blacklist function takes effect only after packets matching specific ACL rules are added to the blacklist through the blacklist acl command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
After the blacklist function is disabled, you can still configure a user-defined blacklist, but the configured blacklist does not take effect.
